content: double_crochet 1 in each st to the middle of the edge of the red row double_crochet 2 in middle st double_crochet in each st un9l you are 3 sts from center dc5tog over next two sts previous dc3tog and next 2 sts double_crochet evenly un9l the middle of the edge of the red 2 double_crochet in st in the middle of the red row double_crochet in half_double_crochet evenly un9l the edge of the gold row 2 double_crochet in the st in the middle of the gold row double_crochet in half_double_crochet to last marked corner double_crochet 2 in half_double_crochet in corner double_crochet in half_double_crochet to end slip_stitch in the top of the beginning csdc fasten_off the game sweater pa-ern by denise ogier please do not reproduce 5 gold stripe insert gold row 1 join with gold in teal 3rd st from the center dc5tog of the v working toward the center skip star9ng st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next double_crochet in center st half_double_crochet in st single_crochet in st slip_stitch next in st slip_stitch in next st and turn to start next row gold row 2 single_crochet in single_crochet half_double_crochet in half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in double_crochet half_double_crochet in half_double_crochet single_crochet in single_crochet slip_stitch in next teal st fasten_off red stripe extension red row 1 join with red in teal st where the gold insert fastens off working across gold half_double_crochet into teal where the gold st fastens off half_double_crochet in each st to corner half_double_crochet 3 in corner half_double_crochet in each st back to teal end with half_double_crochet in teal where gold fastens slip_stitch into next teal st chain 2 skip teal st slip_stitch into teal one more up turn red row 2 decrease first two half_double_crochet double_crochet in half_double_crochet to corner double_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in corner half_double_crochet double_crochet in half_double_crochet to end decrease last two half_double_crochet skip unworked teal st slip_stitch in next st fasten_off 6 completed stripes at le4 shoulder fill in the split stripes to prepare for body pattern join with light gray in teal one s9tch up from where the red is abached chain 2 skip st where red is abached skip red decrease slip_stitch in next red st chain 2 skip 1 red st slip_stitch in next red st should be second from red outer point turn and work back across light gray chain 3 skip chain 2 space single_crochet into chain space chain 3 skip st slip_stitch into next st fasten_off repeat on other split sec9on on opposite side of red extension 7 split stripes filled in before star@ng body pa ern body you now need to work 48 loops around your en9re sweater there are lots of places in the shoulder and stripes pabern up un9l now where you can pick up or lose a s9tch here and there so it might not be an even number ideally the following mesh has 2 sts unworked per loop a total of 3 sts for each pabern repeat but
